src:
Vlahović promašio dve šanse, Viola se provukla
Parma nosi kući vredan bod

03 Nov 2019

Uspela je Fjorentina da izbegne poraz protiv Parme u zanimljivom okršaju odigranom na stadionu Artemio Franki - 1:1. Oba trenera bila su lišena usluga nekoliko zapaženih prvotimaca, kod domaćih nije bilo Riberija, Kaseresa i Pecele, na drugoj strani su nedostajali Ingleze, Bruno Alves i Grasi, pa je i fudbal bio nešto siromašniji.
Parma je bolje otvorila utakmicu, sa nekoliko opasnih napada preko iskusnog Žervinja koji ju je doveo i u vođstvo u 40. minutu posle sjajnog bega i pasa u prostor od strane iskusnog Slovaka Kucke. Loptu je u začetku te akcije izgubio Kjeza, a mnogo mlađi štoperi Viole nisu uspeli da stignu hitronogog napadača iz Obale Slonovače koji je stigao do trećeg pogotka u Seriji A ove sezone.
Koliko je Viola bila odsutna u prvom poluvremenu svedoči i podatak da je prvu pravu šansu imala tek u završnici prvog dela kada je maldi Ranijeri spremio priliku Boatengu koji je loše šutirao.
Prodrmao je Vinćenco Montela svoj tim na pauzi. Fjorentina je dominirala, ali je i teško dolazila do prilika. U 54. minutu na terenu se našao i mladi Srbin Dušan Vlahović koji je zamenio Rašida Gezala, a mogao je da dođe i do prvenca da je imao malo sreće. Nekadašnji napadač Partizana propustio je dve izgledne prilike, jednom mu je odbranio golman Sepe, a drugi put je prebacio čitav gol.
Domaćin je do izjednačenja došao u 67. minutu posle centaršuta brazilskog beka Dalbera i udarca glavom u padu veziste Kastrovilija. Pokušala je Viola u završnici da se dočepa tri boda, ali se Parma odbranila i na kraju možda i zaslužila remi, barem zbog izdanja u prvom poluvremenu.
Nikola Milenković je odigrao standardnih 90 minuta za Fjorentinu, dok je Aleksa Terzić presedeo čitav meč na klupi za rezerve.

ITALIJA 1 - 11. kolo

text:
Vlahovic missed two chances, Viola slipped
Parma carries home a valuable point

03 Nov 2019

Fiorentina managed to avoid defeat against Parma in an interesting match played at Artemio Franki Stadium - 1: 1. Both coaches were deprived of the services of a few notable first team players, the home team lacked Ribery, Caceres and Pecella, on the other hand lacked Ingleze, Bruno Alves and Grasi, so the football was a bit poorer.
Parma better opened the game, with several dangerous attacks over the experienced Zervin who brought her into the lead in the 40th minute after a great run and dogs into the space by the experienced Slovac Kucka. The ball was lost to Kjez at the start of that action, and the much younger Viola stoppers were unable to get the fast-paced Ivory Coast striker to reach the third Serie A goal of the season.
The fact that Viola was absent in the first half is evidenced by the fact that she had the first real chance only in the end of the first part when Maldi Ranieri saved the opportunity for Boateng who shot poorly.
He prodded Vincenzo Montel his team on the break. Fiorentina dominated, but she also found it difficult to reach opportunities. In the 54th minute, young Serb Dusan Vlahovic found himself on the field, replacing Rashid Gezal, and he could have made his debut if he was lucky. The former Partizan striker missed two chances, once defended by goalkeeper Sepe, and the second time he switched over the whole goal.
The home side equalized in the 67th minute after midfielder Brazilian midfielder Dalber and a header in the fall of midfielder Castrovilli. Viola tried to gain three points in the final, but Parma defended herself and eventually deserved a draw, at least for the first half.
Nikola Milenkovic played the standard 90 minutes for Fiorentina, while Aleksa Terzic sat out the entire match on the reserve bench.

ITALY 1 - 11 round
